mapper.insert: insert into hms_member(name, tel, email, id, password, profile_photo, nickname, postno, basic_address, detail_address, birth, status_message, created_date, authority) values(#{name}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{id}, sha2(#{password},256), #{profilePhoto}, #{nickname}, #{postno}, #{basicAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{birth}, #{statusMessage}, #{createdDate}, #{authority})
mapper.select: select member_id, name, email, created_date from hms_member order by member_id desc
select member_id, name, email, tel, created_date from hms_member where member_id=#{no}
